GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single object containing the request article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing the comments for the requested article

comments.body: This is a bad article name
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the comments array for the requested article

exampleRequest.body: This is the greatest comment.  EVER.

comment.body: This is the greatest comment.  EVER.
comment.author: lurker

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: allows the 'votes' property of the given article to be incremented or decremented by passing either a positive or negative number to the 'inc_votes' property of the request body

article.title: Does Mitch predate civilisation?
article.author: icellusedkars
article.body: Archaeologists have uncovered a gigantic statue from the dawn of humanity, and it has an uncanny resemblance to Mitch. Surely I am not the only person who can see this?!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a single comment by comment_id
